meanings.definition: Make a sharp sibilant sound as of the letter s.
meanings.sent1: The snake was hissing loudly in the grass.
meanings.sent2: I heard the cat hissing at the dog next door.
meanings.sent3: The kettle on the stove started hissing like an angry teapot.
meanings.sent4: The wind hissed through the trees, sounding like a whispering ghost.
meanings.sent5: The steam from the hot cup of tea rose with a hissing sound.

meanings.sent1: The hissing of the steam was heard from the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The sudden hissing startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent3: The audience erupted into laughter when the comedian mimicked a hissing snake.
meanings.sent4: The hissing of the wind outside made the house feel eerie.
meanings.sent5: The hissing of the kettle signaled that the water was boiling.
